title: Borjomi-Kharagauli National Park
about: Borjomi-Kharagauli National Park - is located in the central part of Georgia and includes Imereti, Javakheti and Shida Kartli regions. Its total area is 107,083 hectares, which is more than 1% of the country's territory. The National Park Administrative and Visitor Centers are located in Borjomi and Kharagauli.
